com.readytalk.swt.effects

Interface FadeEffect.Fadeable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bubble, PopOverComposite, PopOverShell
    Enclosing class:
    FadeEffect

    public static interface FadeEffect.Fadeable
    Classes that need to implement a FadeEffect must implement this interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fade(int alpha)
      This method is called on each step of the Fade.
      This method should handle actually setting the alpha of either the Shell or GC
      boolean fadeComplete(int targetAlpha)
      This method is called by the FadeEffect after each step to determine whether or not the component has gone from the current to the targetAlpha.

    • Method Detail

      • fadeComplete

        boolean fadeComplete(int targetAlpha)
        This method is called by the FadeEffect after each step to determine whether or not the component has gone from the current to the targetAlpha.
        Parameters:
        targetAlpha - The targetAlpha you defined as part of the FadeEffect.
        Returns:
        True if the component is at the desired alpha, false otherwise (continues the FadeEffect execution).

      • fade

        void fade(int alpha)
        This method is called on each step of the Fade.
        This method should handle actually setting the alpha of either the Shell or GC
        Parameters:
        alpha - The current alpha in the effect (will start at the target alpha and end at the target alpha).
